* delete ":"
<python>
import string
allchars = string.maketrans('','')
options = options.translate(allchars, ':')
</python>

* Replace 'e' with 'a', delete 'o'
<python>
import string
aTob = string.maketrans('e','a') 
s = 'hello python' 
print s.translate(aTob, 'o') 
</python>
